summary: The sprint planning architect reviewed the backlog for records conforming to standard types (US, WF, STYLE), identifying one non-conforming DEV-001 documentation task and suggesting reclassification to maintain a clean sprint backlog.

actions.task: Propose removing or reclassifying DEV-001 from the backlog

risks.risk: Non-conforming stories like DEV-001 could clutter the backlog and not fit the sprint execution flow
risks.mitigation: Reclassify as a non-story item or move to a separate Docs section
